channel.title: Paup on PhyloTips: Tips for those using phylogenies in their work
channel.description: Recent content in Paup on PhyloTips: Tips for those using phylogenies in their work

item.title: PAUP batch files
item.description: This is a backup courtesy of the Internet Archiveâ€™s Wayback Machine of a page I made shortly after graduate school with batch files for PAUP. May they be of some utility to you. Phylogenetic analysis Each item includes PAUP batch files or commands where appropriate. I wrote this page for the Farrell Lab website, but have included it here as well. This page is mostly useful for the batch files which are on it.
